Text:
one question , 
these transformers comics that u uploaded are based on the three transformers movie. Right?

or are these related to the limited series and ongoing ones that are currently being published by IDW (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Transformers_(IDW_Publishing)#Chronological_comic_order)
tpbbabu, the Transformers comics I uploaded recently are based on the three Transformers movies and not related to the current ongoing series.
